rspec_tour.description: A node with a blockstore that is loaded from an image backed dataset. The dataset is your private copy, you can change it as needed.
rspec_tour.instructions: After you log in, cd into /mydata and use it. The data will be retained across reboots, but any changes you make will be lost when you terminate your experiment. If you want to save a new copy of your data after modification, go to the Actions dropdown menu above and choose List Datasets. Find the dataset, click through and then click on Snapshot.
